hotels.name: Hotel Riviera Resort
highlights: Close to golf courses and the beach walk
hotels.description: A beachfront resort offering unparalleled luxury and stunning ocean views.
descriptionParagraphs: Riviera Resort is a luxurious all-inclusive beachfront hotel, perfectly located for a serene and relaxinadults-only vacation. Situated just north of the island's main town, the resort is an ideal escape where you can unwind and indulge in the stunning surroundings with your companion.

The resort consists of several low-rise buildings nestled around two inviting pool areas, complete with sun loungers and a poolside bar. Here, you can walk at a leisurely pace along the beach or take a refreshing swim. After a day in the sun, boost your energy at our state-of-the-art gym or challenge your travel partner to a game of tennis at the nearby Riviera Oasis Resort.

In the evening, enjoy expertly prepared meals at the resort's diverse restaurants, offering both buffet and à la carte options, including Italian cuisine. As the sun sets, our talented mixologists are ready to craft the perfect cocktail to enhance your evening.
The resort is exclusively for adults aged 18 and over, making it the ideal destination for a peaceful and rejuvenating retreat.
hotels.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before check-in
hotels.roomDescription: At Riviera Resort, we offer a variety of luxurious and comfortable rooms designed to suit your needs and enhance your stay. Whether you’re seeking a tranquil retreat or a touch of indulgence, our rooms are thoughtfully designed to provide the perfect balance of style and relaxation.

rooms.description: Indulge in our 48-square-meter Swim-Up Double Room at Hotel Riviera Resort, featuring direct access to a shared pool from your private terrace. This room includes a queen-size bed, breakfast, and free WiFi, offering the perfect retreat for two guests seeking luxury and convenience.
amenities: Minibar with complimentary soft drinks, juice and milk (alcoholic beverages available upon request for an additional fee)
Stroller, high chair, and crib upon request

rooms.description: Indulge in unparalleled luxury in our Suite, where sophistication meets comfort. Each detail is thoughtfully curated to create a serene retreat, featuring a spacious layout that allows for both relaxation and productivity. Sink into the plush king-size bed for a restful night's sleep, and enjoy the convenience of modern amenities at your fingertips.

Indulge in our 50-square-meter Penthouse Suite in Marbella, featuring a luxurious king-size bed and stylish decor. Enjoy complimentary breakfast and modern amenities such as free Wi-Fi and room service, making this the perfect retreat for those seeking comfort and elegance in a stunning setting.

Dive into luxury in our 50-square-meter Swim-Up Double Room, featuring direct access to a shared pool from your terrace. With a plush king-size bed, complimentary breakfast, and modern amenities like free Wi-Fi and room service, this room offers the perfect blend of relaxation and convenience for an unforgettable getaway.

Indulge in our 48-square-meter Swim-Up Double Room at Hotel Riviera Resort, featuring direct access to a shared pool from your private terrace. This room includes a queen-size bed, breakfast, and free WiFi, offering the perfect retreat for two guests seeking luxury and convenience.
amenities: Minibar with complimentary soft drinks, juice and milk (alcoholic beverages available upon request for an additional fee)
Stroller, high chair, and crib upon request

aboutTheRooms.headingText: At Riviera Resort, we offer a variety of luxurious and comfortable rooms designed to suit your needs and enhance your stay. Whether you’re seeking a tranquil retreat or a touch of indulgence, our rooms are thoughtfully designed to provide the perfect balance of style and relaxation.

cards.title: Double Room
cards.text: Enjoy a 40-square-meter Double Room at Hotel Riviera Resort, featuring a queen-size bed, complimentary breakfast, and free WiFi. Relax on your private balcony or terrace and take advantage of the shared pool, perfect for two guests seeking comfort and elegance.

cards.title: Suite with Balcony
cards.text: Indulge in our 48-square-meter Swim-Up Double Room at Hotel Riviera Resort, featuring direct access to a shared pool from your private terrace. This room includes a queen-size bed, breakfast, and free WiFi, offering the perfect retreat for two guests seeking luxury and convenience.

cards.title: Penthouse Suit
cards.text: Stay in our 40-square-meter Ocean View Double Room at Hotel Riviera Resort, featuring a queen-size bed, private balcony with stunning sea views, and access to a shared pool. Enjoy complimentary breakfast and free WiFi, perfect for two guests seeking a serene getaway.

cards.title: Swim-Up Double Room
cards.text: Experience luxury in our 50-square-meter Terrace Double Room at Hotel Riviera Resort, featuring a king-size bed, private pool, and spacious terrace. Enjoy complimentary breakfast and free WiFi, perfect for two guests looking for a private and relaxing escape.

infoBoxItems: Minibar with complimentary soft drinks and water (alcoholic beverages available upon request for an additional fee)

restaurant.introParagraph: Hotel Riviera Resort features three restaurants and four bars. The main restaurant offers a buffet with themed nights, blending international cuisine with Spanish specialties.

sections.title: Dining at the hotel
sections.description: At Hotel Riviera Resort, we take pride in offering an exceptional culinary experience that matches the elegance and luxury of our beautiful Spanish location. Whether you’re in the mood for a relaxed beachside snack or a gourmet dinner, our restaurants and bars are designed to cater to every taste and occasion.

sections.title: The Mediterranean Restaurant
sections.description: Indulge in the freshest local seafood and authentic Mediterranean flavors at our signature restaurant. Our chefs craft dishes inspired by the region, using only the finest ingredients to create a menu that reflects the rich culinary traditions of Spain.

sections.title: The Rooftop Bar
sections.description: For a more laid-back atmosphere, head to our stunning Rooftop Bar. Sip on expertly crafted cocktails while enjoying panoramic views of the Spanish coastline. It’s the perfect spot to unwind at sunset or enjoy an evening with friends.

sections.title: Poolside Café
sections.description: Whether you’re spending the day by the pool or looking for a quick bite, our Poolside Café offers a variety of light snacks, refreshing drinks, and healthy options to keep you energized throughout the day.

sections.title: Table reservations
sections.description: Table reservations are required at the à la carte restaurants. Smart casual dress code applies. You also have access to the following at the neighboring sister hotel: Asian À La Carte Restaurant (not included in the All-Inclusive package).

infoBox.title: Bar and restaurants
infoBox.description: Our restaurant accommodates any dietary needs, including all types of allergies. Please let us know in advance, and we will ensure your meal is prepared safely and to your preferences.

poolAndBeach.introParagraph: At the hotel’s pools, you can relax and enjoy the tranquility of your vacation. If you prefer the beach, the beautiful Marbella Beach is located right by the hotel. Please note: There are rocks and stone formations in the water at Marbella Beach, directly in front of the hotel. Other nearby beaches include the following:

beaches.title: Marbella Beach
beaches.description: Known for relaxation and stunning views, Marbella Beach offers wide, fine-grained sandy shores and crystal-clear waters. Perfect for sunbathing and leisurely swims. Please be aware that the water deepens quickly, and waves are common.

beaches.title: Puerto Banús Beach
beaches.description: One of the most vibrant beaches, Puerto Banús offers a lively atmosphere and close proximity to the marina, shops, and restaurants. Sun loungers are available for rent, making it an ideal spot to relax after exploring the area.

beaches.title: Cabopino Beach
beaches.description: A tranquil spot with picturesque sand dunes, Cabopino Beach is family-friendly and perfect for a peaceful day by the sea. With ample space for picnics and relaxation, this beach offers a serene escape just a short drive away.

beaches.title: Nikki Beach
beaches.description: For those seeking luxury, Nikki Beach combines beachside relaxation with a vibrant atmosphere. Known for its beach club, live music, and cocktails, it’s an ideal destination for guests looking to experience a more upscale beach day.

poolList: Main Pool: 425 m²
Secondary Pool: 220 m²
Private Pool for Prestige Club guests only
Sun loungers available by the pool and on the beach
Parasols available by the pool
Pool towels available with a deposit

activities.title: Activities
activities.description: The hotel features a spa offering a range of relaxing treatments, a hot tub, and a sauna. For those looking to stay active during their vacation, guests can use the tennis courts at the neighboring Melia Dunas Beach Resort & Spa (200 meters away). Reservations can be made at the reception of Melia Llana.

categories.name: Spa
categories.description: Escape to pure relaxation at our spa, where soothing treatments and a tranquil atmosphere rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul. From calming massages to luxurious facials, every moment is designed for your well-being. Let stress melt away as you unwind in our serene sanctuary.

categories.name: Gym
categories.description: Elevate your fitness routine in our state-of-the-art gym, equipped with the latest machines and free weights. Whether you're lifting, running, or stretching, we've got you covered. Stay energized with personalized training options and breathtaking views, making every workout inspiring.

categories.name: Group Training
categories.description: Elevate your fitness routine with our dynamic group classes, designed to challenge and energize. From yoga to high-intensity workouts, we offer something for every level. Stay motivated with expert instructors and a supportive atmosphere, making every session both fun and effective.

categories.name: Yoga
categories.description: Elevate your wellness with yoga sessions, where the soothing sound of waves enhances your practice. Whether you're stretching, meditating, or flowing, we've got you covered. Stay balanced with personalized guidance and breathtaking ocean views, making every session both calming and inspiring.

location.address: Sunset Boulevard 25, Playa de la Mar, 29600 Marbella, Spain

hotels.name: Sunny Lodge
hotels.description: A sunny escape in the heart of Mallorca with stunning poolside views.
descriptionParagraphs: Sunny Lodge is an idyllic hotel located in the picturesque town of Mallorca, known for its panoramic views and relaxing atmosphere.
Guests can unwind in luxury rooms with private balconies overlooking the pool, or enjoy a drink at the rooftop bar while taking in the beautiful sunset.
Located just 900 meters from the city center, Sunny Lodge offers a perfect balance between peace and accessibility, ideal for those looking to explore the area without sacrificing relaxation.
With modern amenities like free WiFi, airport shuttle, and a rooftop bar, Sunny Lodge ensures a comfortable stay for all its guests.
hotels.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in
hotels.roomDescription: Welcome to Sunny Lodge, where every room is a vibrant escape filled with warmth and comfort. Embrace the stunning views of Mallorca's turquoise waters while relaxing in modern accommodations designed with family-friendly touches. Our rooms blend contemporary style with cozy atmospheres, making them perfect for families and travelers alike.

rooms.description: Retreat to our Cozy Single Room, a perfect haven for solo adventurers. This compact yet comfortable space features a plush queen-size bed, a dedicated workspace, and modern amenities. Enjoy tranquil views of the surrounding gardens and recharge with complimentary breakfast and high-speed Wi-Fi to enhance your stay.
amenities: Mini fridge stocked with soft drinks

rooms.description: Enjoy our Spacious Twin Room, thoughtfully designed for friends or families. This inviting room features two comfortable double beds and a balcony that opens up to breathtaking views of the island. With modern decor and all essential amenities, your stay will be both comfortable and convenient, complemented by free Wi-Fi and a delicious breakfast.

Our Family Double Room is perfect for families seeking comfort and style. Featuring a king-size bed and a cozy pull-out sofa, this spacious room ensures everyone has a good night's sleep. Relax on the private balcony with pool views and enjoy a range of amenities, including a complimentary breakfast to start your day off right.

Indulge in our Deluxe Pool View Room, where luxury meets relaxation. With a king-size bed, chic furnishings, and expansive views of the sparkling pool, this room offers the perfect setting for unwinding. Enjoy complimentary breakfast, high-speed Wi-Fi, and access to all the hotel's fantastic amenities for an unforgettable stay.

aboutTheRooms.headingText: At Sunny Lodge, we embrace the sun-drenched charm of Mallorca. Each room is designed to reflect the island's vibrant spirit, offering modern amenities and a cozy environment for an unforgettable stay.

cards.title: Cozy Single Room
cards.text: Our Cozy Single Room is a perfect little retreat, offering a queen-size bed and a peaceful ambiance to help you recharge after exploring Mallorca. With a serene view of the gardens, this room is equipped with complimentary breakfast and Wi-Fi to ensure you feel right at home.

cards.title: Spacious Twin Room
cards.text: Perfect for family or friends, our Spacious Twin Room features two comfortable double beds and a private balcony overlooking the stunning landscapes of Mallorca. Enjoy complimentary breakfast and high-speed Wi-Fi to enhance your stay.

cards.title: Family Double Room
cards.text: Our Family Double Room offers ample space and comfort for everyone. With a king-size bed and a cozy pull-out sofa, it's ideal for family vacations. Enjoy a beautiful pool view from your balcony while starting your day with a complimentary breakfast.

cards.title: Deluxe Pool View Room
cards.text: Experience luxury in our Deluxe Pool View Room, featuring modern decor and breathtaking views. With a king-size bed and all the amenities needed for relaxation, this room is your private oasis in sunny Mallorca.

aboutTheRestaurant.headingText: Sunny Lodge offers a diverse culinary experience with on-site dining options that bring the flavors of Mallorca to your table. Enjoy scenic views and local specialties as you dine in style.
aboutTheRestaurant.introParagraph: At Sunny Lodge, we are proud to offer a selection of dining options that cater to all tastes. From casual poolside snacks to exquisite dining under the stars, our restaurants and bars ensure a delightful gastronomic journey during your stay.

sections.title: The Poolside Restaurant
sections.description: Our Poolside Restaurant offers an array of local and international dishes, perfect for a relaxed lunch or dinner by the water. With fresh ingredients sourced daily, our chefs create vibrant flavors that capture the essence of Mallorca.

sections.title: The Rooftop Bar
sections.description: For a spectacular evening, visit our Rooftop Bar and enjoy cocktails crafted by our expert mixologists. With panoramic views of the Mallorcan skyline, it's the ideal spot for a sunset drink or a nightcap under the stars.

sections.title: The Garden Café
sections.description: Set in our lush tropical garden, The Garden Café is a serene escape where you can enjoy light bites and refreshing drinks throughout the day. Our menu includes freshly made smoothies, salads, and a selection of pastries.

sections.title: Dining Reservations
sections.description: To ensure a memorable dining experience, we recommend making reservations for dinner at our a la carte restaurants. Dress code is smart casual, and we look forward to welcoming you for an unforgettable meal.

infoBox.title: Dietary Options
infoBox.description: We cater to a variety of dietary needs. Please inform our staff of any allergies or special requests so that we can prepare your meal accordingly.

poolAndBeach.introParagraph: At Sunny Lodge, you can unwind by the pools or explore the nearby beautiful beaches. Located just a short walk from the city center, our pools and nearby beaches offer the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure.

beaches.title: Cala Major Beach
beaches.description: Just a stone's throw from the lodge, Cala Major Beach is a popular spot known for its golden sands and clear waters. Perfect for sunbathing and a refreshing swim, this beach also offers various water sports and activities for thrill-seekers.

beaches.title: Palma Nova Beach
beaches.description: Ideal for families, Palma Nova Beach features a long stretch of fine sand and calm, shallow waters. With plenty of sun loungers, beach bars, and restaurants, it’s a great spot for a leisurely day by the sea.

beaches.title: Magaluf Beach
beaches.description: A vibrant beach known for its lively atmosphere, Magaluf Beach is perfect for those who enjoy a bit of excitement. Enjoy water sports, beach volleyball, or relax at one of the many beach bars and restaurants along the promenade.

beaches.title: Illetas Beach
beaches.description: For a more secluded experience, head to Illetas Beach. Nestled in a cove, this beach offers crystal-clear waters and a quieter atmosphere, perfect for those seeking tranquility and stunning views.

Rooftop Pool with panoramic views of Mallorca
Private Cabanas available for rent
Poolside Bar offering cocktails and light snacks
Complimentary pool towels provided

hotels.name: Cityscape
hotels.description: Modern design hotel with easy access to the vibrant nightlife of Crete.
descriptionParagraphs: Cityscape is a contemporary hotel located in the heart of Crete, offering guests stylish accommodations with a focus on modern comfort.
With two pools, including an exclusive infinity pool and spa, guests can relax in style after a day exploring the vibrant nightlife of Crete.
The hotel is just 300 meters from the beach, providing easy access to both the stunning coastlines and the buzzing city atmosphere.
Whether you're relaxing by the pool, enjoying the hotel’s free WiFi, or savoring a meal at the on-site restaurant, Cityscape combines luxury with convenience to offer an unforgettable stay.
hotels.roomDescription: At Cityscape, we offer a diverse range of elegantly designed rooms that perfectly capture the essence of Crete. Each space is tailored to provide guests with comfort and tranquility, allowing you to relax after a day of adventure. With convenient access to our exclusive infinity pool and spa, and a vibrant atmosphere just steps away, our accommodations serve as a perfect base for exploring the beautiful surroundings.

rooms.description: Gather your loved ones in our spacious 50-square-meter Cozy Family Room. With a comfortable queen-size bed and two twin beds, this room is designed for family fun and relaxation. Enjoy the modern amenities, free Wi-Fi, and a delightful balcony that overlooks the vibrant gardens, perfect for unwinding together after a day of exploring.
amenities: Queen-size bed and two twin beds

rooms.description: Breathe in the fresh air from your 40-square-meter Garden View Double Room, complete with a serene balcony overlooking the lush gardens. Featuring two cozy double beds and tasteful decor, this room provides a restful escape for friends or family, complete with modern amenities to ensure a delightful stay.

Dive into luxury in our 60-square-meter Luxury Swim-Up Room, where the pool is just a step away from your terrace. With a plush king-size bed and contemporary decor, this room combines style and comfort, making it an ideal sanctuary for guests seeking a unique and relaxing experience.

Stay in style in our 75-square-meter Contemporary Loft. Featuring an open-plan layout with a king-size bed, living area, and kitchenette, this room is designed for those who appreciate a modern lifestyle. The loft also boasts stunning views of the city and the sea, creating a perfect backdrop for your stay.
amenities: Luxurious bathroom with tub and shower

aboutTheRooms.headingText: At Cityscape, we offer thoughtfully designed accommodations that cater to families and travelers alike. Each room is a sanctuary, blending modern comforts with the stunning landscape of Crete. Whether you're lounging by the pool or exploring the nearby beaches, our rooms provide a perfect retreat.

cards.title: Cozy Family Room
cards.text: Perfect for families, our Cozy Family Room features ample space, modern decor, and amenities to ensure a comfortable stay. Enjoy direct access to the lush gardens and the hotel's family-friendly atmosphere.

cards.title: Garden View Double Room
cards.text: Our Garden View Double Room offers a serene environment with beautiful views and a spacious layout. Equipped with modern amenities, this room is ideal for guests looking to relax and rejuvenate.

cards.title: Luxury Swim-Up Room
cards.text: Experience the ultimate luxury in our Swim-Up Room, where you can dive into the pool directly from your private terrace. It's the perfect blend of relaxation and sophistication, ensuring an unforgettable stay.

cards.title: Contemporary Loft
cards.text: Our spacious Contemporary Loft features an elegant design and ample living space. Perfect for long stays or family getaways, enjoy a home-away-from-home experience with breathtaking views.

infoBoxItems: Flat-screen TV with local and international channels

aboutTheRestaurant.headingText: Cityscape offers a variety of dining options that celebrate the flavors of Crete, with a modern twist. Our restaurants and bars cater to all tastes, from casual snacks to fine dining experiences.
aboutTheRestaurant.introParagraph: At Cityscape, we invite you to indulge in a culinary journey that showcases the vibrant spirit of Crete. Whether you’re in the mood for a sophisticated dining experience or a casual meal by the pool, our diverse dining options provide something for everyone.

sections.title: The Infinity Pool Bar
sections.description: Unwind at the Infinity Pool Bar, where you can enjoy refreshing cocktails and light snacks with stunning views of the Cretan landscape. It's the perfect place to relax and soak up the sun during the day or enjoy a sunset drink.

sections.title: The Cretan Bistro
sections.description: Sample the authentic flavors of Crete at The Cretan Bistro. Our chefs craft dishes using locally sourced ingredients to bring you a true taste of the region, blending traditional recipes with modern flair. Ideal for a cozy dinner with friends or family.

sections.title: The Beachfront Café
sections.description: Located just steps from the beach, our Beachfront Café offers a variety of light bites and refreshing drinks, perfect for a quick break during your day of exploring Crete's beautiful coastline.

sections.title: Table Reservations
sections.description: We recommend reserving a table for dinner at our à la carte restaurants. Smart casual dress code applies. Please let us know if you have any dietary requirements so that we can prepare a delightful meal tailored to your needs.

infoBox.title: Dietary Options
infoBox.description: Our restaurants accommodate a variety of dietary needs, including options for allergies and special dietary preferences. Please inform our staff in advance, and we will ensure that your meal is prepared to your satisfaction.

poolAndBeach.introParagraph: Cityscape offers two stylish pools and is located just 500 meters from the beach. Relax by the exclusive infinity pool or take a short stroll to the coast to enjoy Crete's beautiful beaches. With modern facilities and convenient access to the shoreline, Cityscape provides the perfect mix of relaxation and adventure.

beaches.title: Elounda Beach
beaches.description: Elounda Beach is a popular destination offering soft sands and calm, turquoise waters. With nearby restaurants and cafes, it’s the perfect spot to relax and soak up the Mediterranean sun. This beach is suitable for families and offers amenities such as sun loungers and umbrellas.

beaches.title: Vai Beach
beaches.description: Famous for its natural palm forest, Vai Beach provides a tropical escape right in Crete. Enjoy a scenic beach surrounded by lush greenery, where you can swim in crystal-clear waters and explore the area’s unique flora. Vai Beach is ideal for nature lovers and those looking to explore the beauty of Crete’s coast.

beaches.title: Balos Lagoon
beaches.description: Known for its white sands and shallow, turquoise waters, Balos Lagoon is a must-visit. This picturesque beach offers breathtaking views and is perfect for a day of swimming and sunbathing. The shallow waters make it suitable for families with young children.

beaches.title: Matala Beach
beaches.description: Matala Beach is famous for its unique sandstone caves and vibrant atmosphere. This beach is perfect for those looking to explore or enjoy a lively day by the sea. With a rich history and beautiful waters, Matala Beach is a favorite for both locals and tourists.

poolList: Main Pool with sun loungers and poolside service
Infinity Pool with breathtaking views of Crete
Private Cabanas available for rent
Poolside Bar offering cocktails and light snacks
Complimentary pool towels available

activities.introParagraph: Cityscape offers a variety of activities designed to enhance your stay, whether you're looking to relax, stay active, or explore the vibrant surroundings of Crete. From on-site fitness facilities to beachside excursions, there's something for everyone.

categories.title: Spa
categories.description: Unwind in our exclusive spa, offering a range of treatments including massages, facials, and body wraps. Our relaxing environment and expert therapists will ensure you leave feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

categories.title: Gym
categories.description: Stay fit during your stay with our fully equipped gym, featuring state-of-the-art machines and free weights. Whether you're lifting, running, or stretching, we have everything you need for an energizing workout.

categories.title: Infinity Pool
categories.description: Take a dip in our stunning infinity pool, offering breathtaking views of Crete. Lounge by the pool with a cocktail or enjoy a relaxing swim in this exclusive area reserved for our guests.

categories.title: Beach Activities
categories.description: Explore the nearby beaches with a range of exciting activities such as snorkeling, jet skiing, and paddleboarding. Whether you're an adventure seeker or just looking to unwind by the sea, the beach is just a short walk away.

hotels.name: Palm Breeze Retreat
hotels.description: A serene retreat in the Maldives offering breathtaking water views.
descriptionParagraphs: Palm Breeze Retreat is a stunning overwater resort nestled in the pristine waters of the Maldives. The resort offers unmatched luxury with its signature overwater bungalows, each featuring a private pool and breathtaking ocean views.

For those seeking adventure, the retreat is known for its world-class scuba diving and snorkeling experiences, allowing guests to explore vibrant coral reefs and exotic marine life just steps from their room.
Located just 100 meters from the beach, Palm Breeze Retreat provides a peaceful escape while remaining close to the natural beauty of the Maldives' famous white-sand shores.

Whether you are basking in the tropical sun by your private pool or indulging in the on-site spa, Palm Breeze Retreat offers an exclusive adults-only experience that combines luxury and relaxation with the beauty of nature.
hotels.roomDescription: At Palm Breeze Retreat, we invite you to indulge in an unparalleled escape where luxury meets serenity. Each of our rooms is designed to provide an intimate haven, harmonizing modern comforts with the breathtaking beauty of the Maldives. From overwater bungalows to private villas, your sanctuary awaits.

rooms.description: Awaken to the soothing sounds of the ocean in our Oceanfront Deluxe Room. Spanning 45 square meters, this beautifully appointed space features a plush king-size bed, a private terrace overlooking the turquoise waters, and luxurious furnishings that promise comfort and relaxation. Enjoy complimentary breakfast and high-speed Wi-Fi for a perfect start to your day.

Experience the magic of the Maldives in our stunning Overwater Bungalow. This spacious 60-square-meter retreat features direct access to the shimmering lagoon, a king-size bed, and a private deck perfect for sunbathing or stargazing. Pamper yourself with modern amenities and indulge in a complimentary breakfast while soaking in the views.

Unwind in our Lagoon View Villa, a spacious 80-square-meter oasis featuring a luxurious king-size bed and stunning views of the lagoon. This villa offers a serene atmosphere, complete with a private pool and a large terrace for ultimate relaxation. Experience personalized service and modern comforts throughout your stay.

Enjoy breathtaking sunsets in our exclusive Sunset Pool Villa. Spanning 90 square meters, this villa features a private infinity pool, expansive living areas, and luxurious amenities that ensure a memorable stay. Revel in the stunning views while enjoying complimentary breakfast and exceptional service.

aboutTheRooms.headingText: Discover tranquility and elegance at Palm Breeze Retreat, where each room is a haven designed for relaxation. Our accommodations provide the perfect backdrop for your getaway, blending modern comforts with the stunning beauty of the Maldives.

cards.title: Oceanfront Deluxe Room
cards.text: Step into our Oceanfront Deluxe Room, where the horizon meets your private terrace. Featuring modern decor and luxurious amenities, this room is the ideal choice for couples seeking a romantic getaway.

cards.title: Overwater Bungalow
cards.text: Our Overwater Bungalow offers direct lagoon access and luxurious comforts. Relax on your private deck or indulge in the warm waters just steps away from your door.

cards.title: Lagoon View Villa
cards.text: Experience luxury in our Lagoon View Villa, featuring a private pool and spacious living areas. Perfect for relaxing or entertaining, it’s an oasis of tranquility.

cards.title: Sunset Pool Villa
cards.text: The Sunset Pool Villa provides a unique opportunity to watch the sun dip below the horizon from your private infinity pool, creating unforgettable memories.

aboutTheRestaurant.headingText: Palm Breeze Retreat offers an exquisite culinary journey in the heart of the Maldives, where guests can savor a blend of local flavors and international cuisines. Dine under the stars or enjoy a casual poolside snack while surrounded by breathtaking ocean views.
aboutTheRestaurant.introParagraph: At Palm Breeze Retreat, we provide an exceptional dining experience with an array of culinary options to suit every palate. From overwater dining to intimate beachside dinners, our restaurants and bars ensure that each meal is a memorable part of your stay.

sections.title: The Overwater Restaurant
sections.description: Enjoy an unforgettable dining experience at The Overwater Restaurant, where you can savor gourmet meals while gazing out over the endless turquoise waters. Our chefs use the freshest ingredients to create a fusion of Maldivian and international dishes.

sections.title: The Sunset Lounge
sections.description: Relax with a cocktail at The Sunset Lounge, a cozy spot that offers panoramic views of the Maldivian sunset. Sip on expertly crafted drinks and enjoy a selection of light bites in a tranquil setting, perfect for unwinding after a day in paradise.

sections.title: The Beachside Grill
sections.description: Dine al fresco at The Beachside Grill, where you can indulge in freshly grilled seafood and prime cuts of meat. With your toes in the sand and the sound of waves lapping the shore, this dining experience brings you closer to nature.

sections.title: Private Dining
sections.description: For a truly personalized experience, Palm Breeze Retreat offers private dining options. Whether it's a romantic dinner on your villa deck or a candlelit beach setup, our team will ensure your meal is tailored to your preferences.

infoBox.title: Dietary Options
infoBox.description: We are pleased to accommodate a variety of dietary needs, including allergies and special preferences. Please inform our staff in advance, and we will ensure that your meals are prepared safely and deliciously.

poolAndBeach.introParagraph: At Palm Breeze Retreat, immerse yourself in a tropical paradise with access to serene private pools and stunning white-sand beaches. Relax by your private pool or explore the vibrant coral reefs just steps from your overwater bungalow. Our pools and beach facilities provide the perfect blend of luxury and natural beauty for a rejuvenating experience in the Maldives.

beaches.title: Palm Beach
beaches.description: Located just a short stroll from the resort, Palm Beach is a pristine stretch of white sand surrounded by crystal-clear waters. Perfect for swimming, sunbathing, or simply taking in the breathtaking ocean views. Relax under the sun with beach loungers and umbrellas provided for your comfort.

beaches.title: Coral Bay
beaches.description: Known for its vibrant coral reefs, Coral Bay offers a unique snorkeling experience just steps from the shore. Explore colorful marine life, including exotic fish and sea turtles, in this protected area. Snorkeling equipment is complimentary for all guests.

beaches.title: Sunset Cove
beaches.description: Sunset Cove is an idyllic spot to watch the sun dip below the horizon. This secluded beach provides a peaceful escape with soft sands and gentle waves, making it the perfect place for a romantic evening or a quiet moment of reflection.

beaches.title: Reef Lagoon

hotels.name: Mountain Escape
hotels.description: An alpine resort perfect for skiing enthusiasts and nature lovers.
descriptionParagraphs: Mountain Escape is a luxurious alpine resort located in the heart of the Swiss Alps. This exclusive retreat offers the ultimate winter wonderland experience, combining ski-in/ski-out access with jaw-dropping views of the iconic Matterhorn.

After a day on the slopes, relax in the heated outdoor pool while surrounded by snow-capped peaks, or indulge in a rejuvenating spa session. Every room is designed with comfort in mind, offering private balconies that overlook the majestic mountains, perfect for sipping hot cocoa after an adventure-filled day.

Whether you are a seasoned skier or a nature enthusiast, Mountain Escape ensures an unforgettable stay. The resort is just 5 kilometers from Zermatt’s charming town center, providing easy access to local dining, shopping, and après-ski activities.

With an adults-only ambiance and world-class amenities like free WiFi, ski storage, and a cozy on-site restaurant and bar, this resort perfectly balances thrilling outdoor pursuits with moments of calm in the lap of luxury.
hotels.roomDescription: At Mountain Escape, we blend alpine charm with modern comfort to create the ultimate getaway. Our thoughtfully designed rooms cater to adults seeking a serene environment, with touches of luxury that complement the breathtaking surroundings of Zermatt.

rooms.description: Experience tranquility in our 45-square-meter Alpine View Double Room, featuring a king-size bed adorned with premium linens and large windows showcasing stunning mountain vistas. With a cozy sitting area, complimentary breakfast, and high-speed WiFi, it’s the perfect escape for couples looking to unwind after a day of adventure.
amenities: Coffee maker with artisanal coffee options

rooms.description: Indulge in our 55-square-meter Mountain Escape Suite, where elegance meets adventure. This suite features a spacious living area, a luxurious king-size bed, and a private balcony offering panoramic views of the iconic Matterhorn. Enjoy amenities like a whirlpool bath and a complimentary breakfast, making your stay truly unforgettable.

Step into our Cozy Cabin Room, a 40-square-meter retreat designed to make you feel at home in the mountains. With rustic wooden decor, a comfortable queen-size bed, and a warm ambiance, this room offers a perfect balance of comfort and style. Enjoy a delightful breakfast and high-speed WiFi, perfect for a cozy stay.

Discover our Charming Studio Room, an intimate space designed for a romantic getaway. This 38-square-meter room features a cozy king-size bed, a small kitchenette for light meals, and a private balcony with enchanting views of the Swiss Alps. Enjoy complimentary breakfast and high-speed WiFi to make your stay even more comfortable.

aboutTheRooms.headingText: Mountain Escape combines luxury with the charm of the Swiss Alps. Each room is designed for adults seeking a peaceful retreat, providing stunning views and a cozy atmosphere.

sections.title: The Alpine Grill
sections.description: Savor the flavors of the Alps at The Alpine Grill, where locally sourced meats and fresh produce are grilled to perfection. This rustic restaurant offers a warm, inviting atmosphere with a roaring fireplace, making it the perfect spot for a post-ski meal.

sections.title: The Mountain Bistro
sections.description: For a more casual dining experience, visit The Mountain Bistro. Here, you can enjoy a variety of Swiss-inspired dishes and international favorites, all in a laid-back setting that’s perfect for midday breaks or informal dinners.

sections.title: Private Dining
sections.description: For an exclusive dining experience, Mountain Escape offers private dining options. Whether it’s a romantic dinner on your chalet terrace or a personalized meal by the fireplace, our team will create a unique and unforgettable evening just for you.

Our outdoor amenities provide a unique alpine experience that combines adventure with ultimate relaxation.

hotels.name: Desert Mirage
hotels.description: An opulent escape into the heart of the Dubai desert, combining luxury and adventure.
descriptionParagraphs: Desert Mirage is an ultra-luxurious oasis nestled in the vast expanse of the Arabian desert. Combining cutting-edge opulence with the mystique of the desert, this exclusive retreat offers a once-in-a-lifetime experience under the shimmering Dubai sun.

Begin your adventure with a heart-pumping dune buggy ride over endless golden dunes, then retreat to your lavish private tent, complete with a personal butler to cater to your every need. The nights are magical, where you can stargaze by the warmth of a bonfire or indulge in an exclusive desert feast under the moonlit sky.

Located just 40 kilometers from Dubai, Desert Mirage allows you to experience the raw beauty of the desert while being just a short drive from the city's glamour. The resort's Royal Suites and Luxury Villas offer panoramic views of the endless desert, creating a perfect balance of serenity and excitement.

Whether you’re seeking adrenaline-fueled adventure or a quiet escape from the world, Desert Mirage offers a curated experience that blends tradition with modern luxury. With a private pool, personalized dune bashing tours, and even camel rides, this adults-only retreat is a true sanctuary for those looking to live out their Arabian Nights fantasy.

hotels.name: Island Breeze Resort
hotels.description: A peaceful retreat offering private beach access and tropical surroundings.
descriptionParagraphs: Island Breeze Resort offers a serene escape enveloped in tropical beauty. Hidden away from the bustling streets of Phuket, this adults-only retreat provides exclusive access to a pristine private beach, where turquoise waters gently lap the shores and palm trees sway in the breeze.

Stay in one of our Garden Suites surrounded by exotic flora, or elevate your experience in our beachfront villas where the sound of the ocean becomes your personal lullaby. Whether you're soaking in the sun by the pool or indulging in a rejuvenating Thai massage, the resort promises a perfect blend of relaxation and luxury.

For those eager to explore, the resort is just minutes away from Phuket's vibrant local markets, offering a true taste of Thailand's cultural richness. Dive into authentic Thai cooking classes or take a sunset stroll along the white sand beach—the choice is yours in this tropical haven.

Island Breeze Resort caters to those seeking both adventure and peace. With activities like beach volleyball, daily yoga sessions, and luxurious spa treatments, this resort lets you enjoy the best of both worlds—whether it's excitement by day or tranquility by night.

hotels.name: Urban Oasis
hotels.description: A tranquil escape in the bustling heart of Tokyo, blending modernity with traditional relaxation.
descriptionParagraphs: Urban Oasis offers a one-of-a-kind retreat for those seeking calm amidst the buzz of Tokyo's fast-paced lifestyle. Located just steps away from the vibrant Shibuya district, this modern yet serene escape allows guests to experience the city without sacrificing tranquility. The rooftop garden, a green haven with panoramic views of the city, provides the perfect place to relax after a day of exploring.

Each room is designed to blend minimalist modern architecture with traditional Japanese touches. Unwind in your own private hot spring bath, or sip on green tea while admiring the skyline from your balcony. For those looking to dive deeper into Japan’s culture, Urban Oasis offers intimate tea ceremonies and traditional Kaiseki dining experiences.

Just a short walk from the hotel, guests can dive into Tokyo's endless attractions—from high-end shopping to hidden alleyway ramen spots. After a day of city life, return to the peace of the hotel and enjoy a soak in the natural hot springs, a luxury rarely found in the city center.

Urban Oasis isn't just a place to stay, it’s a lifestyle experience. Whether you're meditating in the rooftop garden or exploring Tokyo’s vibrant streets, this hotel offers the perfect balance of urban excitement and peaceful relaxation.

sections.title: Private Dining
sections.description: For a more intimate experience, Urban Oasis offers exclusive private dining options. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or seeking a quiet dinner with views of Tokyo’s skyline, our team will create a personalized dining experience tailored to your tastes.

poolAndBeach.introParagraph: At Urban Oasis, immerse yourself in tranquility with our stunning rooftop garden and soothing hot springs. Designed to provide a peaceful escape from Tokyo's vibrant energy, our amenities offer a perfect balance of relaxation and rejuvenation.

features.title: Rooftop Garden
features.description: Escape the city's hustle and bustle in our lush rooftop garden, where you can relax surrounded by greenery and enjoy panoramic views of Tokyo's skyline. This serene space is perfect for meditation, reading, or enjoying a cup of traditional Japanese tea.

features.title: Private Hot Springs
features.description: Unwind in our exclusive hot springs, where you can soak in natural mineral waters in a tranquil setting. This unique feature provides a traditional Japanese bathing experience, allowing you to relax and rejuvenate after exploring the city.

features.title: Relaxation Lounge
features.description: Our relaxation lounge offers a cozy retreat with comfortable seating and calming decor. It’s the perfect spot to unwind with a book or enjoy complimentary refreshments while taking in the garden views.

features.title: Outdoor Terrace
features.description: Enjoy fresh air and beautiful views on our outdoor terrace. Perfect for morning yoga sessions or evening cocktails, this space seamlessly blends nature with the urban environment.

poolList: Rooftop swimming pool with stunning city views
Private hot springs for guests seeking relaxation
Lounge chairs and umbrellas available around the pool area
Complimentary pool towels provided for guests

activities.introParagraph: Urban Oasis offers a variety of activities designed to help you relax and experience the rich culture of Japan, while providing modern comforts in the heart of Tokyo. Whether you seek serenity or a cultural adventure, our offerings provide the perfect balance between relaxation and urban excitement.

categories.title: Tea Ceremonies
categories.description: Immerse yourself in the tradition of Japanese tea ceremonies. Hosted by experienced tea masters, these intimate sessions provide insight into the cultural significance of tea and offer a peaceful moment of reflection.

categories.title: Private Hot Spring Baths
categories.description: Unwind in our luxurious private hot springs, where you can soak in natural mineral waters while enjoying a serene atmosphere. These baths offer a unique relaxation experience, blending tradition with modern comforts.

categories.title: City Tours
categories.description: Explore Tokyo’s vibrant streets with our guided city tours. From famous landmarks to hidden gems, these tours provide a comprehensive look at Tokyo's diverse culture, history, and modern wonders.

categories.title: Rooftop Yoga
categories.description: Join our daily yoga sessions on the rooftop garden, where you can practice mindfulness and relaxation with stunning views of the city skyline. These sessions are designed to help you find peace and balance amidst the bustling city.

hotels.name: Coastal Haven
hotels.description: A modern hotel located by the coast, offering stunning views and luxurious amenities.
descriptionParagraphs: Welcome to Coastal Haven, where every day starts with a sunrise over Atlanten och avslutas med en cocktail i handen på vår lyxiga takbar. Bara 500 meter från Lissabons livliga centrum, erbjuder denna moderna pärla den perfekta kombinationen av strandvibbar och stadspuls.

Vakna till ljudet av vågorna som slår mot stranden och ta din morgonkaffe på din privata balkong med en fantastisk havsutsikt. Om det inte räcker för att få dig i semesterläge, kan du ta en sväng upp till takbaren, där du kan skåla för livet med panoramautsikt över både staden och kusten. Med en cocktail i handen, förstås.

När du inte kopplar av på stranden eller sippar drinkar, är Coastal Haven ett stenkast från några av Lissabons bästa sevärdheter. Utforska stadens charmiga gränder, hoppa på en båt för en dagstur på havet, eller släpp loss på en beachvolleybollmatch för att bränna av några extra kalorier (så du kan unna dig en extra cocktail senare!).

Coastal Haven handlar om att njuta av det bästa från två världar: stadens energi och havets ro. Och med toppklassiga bekvämligheter som spa, gym och gratis Wi-Fi, kan du vara säker på att din vistelse kommer att vara så bekväm som den är oförglömlig.
hotels.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in
hotels.roomDescription: At Coastal Haven, every room is thoughtfully designed to provide a cozy retreat with a touch of luxury. Whether you’re looking for a peaceful escape by the coast or a base to explore the vibrant streets of Lisbon, our rooms blend comfort with modern amenities to make your stay unforgettable.

rooms.description: Relax in our 38-square-meter Serenity Double Room, featuring soft tones inspired by the Portuguese coast. This room offers a queen-size bed, a peaceful garden view, and modern touches like free high-speed WiFi and complimentary breakfast. Perfect for couples or solo travelers looking for tranquility.

Soak in breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean from our 42-square-meter Panoramic Ocean View Room. Designed for relaxation, it features a king-size bed, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a private balcony perfect for watching the sunset. With complimentary breakfast and modern amenities, this room offers a serene escape by the sea.

Ideal for families, the 50-square-meter Coastal Family Suite offers ample space with two connecting rooms, a king-size bed, and two twin beds. With direct access to a private garden, this suite features a spacious bathroom, free breakfast, and all the essentials to make your family’s stay memorable.
amenities: Family bathroom with tub and shower

rooms.description: Elevate your stay in Lisbon with our 70-square-meter Horizon Penthouse Loft. Featuring a spacious living area, a king-size bed, and a private rooftop terrace with panoramic ocean views, this luxurious suite is perfect for guests who want to experience Lisbon in style. Enjoy a gourmet breakfast, free WiFi, and exclusive amenities.
amenities: Private rooftop terrace with ocean views
Daily housekeeping with evening turndown service

aboutTheRooms.headingText: Discover the coastal charm of Lisbon with our collection of elegant and family-friendly rooms, where comfort meets the Atlantic breeze. Each room at Coastal Haven is designed to provide a relaxing escape, whether you're exploring the city or unwinding by the sea.

cards.title: Serenity Double Room
cards.text: Relax in our cozy Serenity Double Room with garden views, a queen-size bed, and modern amenities. Perfect for a peaceful getaway.

cards.title: Panoramic Ocean View Room
cards.text: Wake up to stunning ocean views in our Panoramic Ocean View Room. Enjoy a king-size bed, private balcony, and complimentary breakfast.

cards.title: Coastal Family Suite
cards.text: Ideal for families, our Coastal Family Suite offers space, comfort, and garden access, with thoughtful amenities for both adults and children.

cards.title: Horizon Penthouse Loft
cards.text: Enjoy luxury living in our Horizon Penthouse Loft, with panoramic ocean views, a private rooftop terrace, and exclusive amenities for a perfect stay.

aboutTheRestaurant.headingText: Coastal Haven offers a culinary journey that combines the flavors of the sea with the city's vibrant energy. Our rooftop bar and restaurant provide stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean, offering a perfect spot to enjoy exquisite meals and cocktails.
aboutTheRestaurant.introParagraph: Welcome to the dining options at Coastal Haven, where guests can enjoy a variety of dishes, from local Portuguese specialties to international favorites. Whether you want a relaxed meal by the beach or a luxurious dining experience at the rooftop bar, we have something for every taste.

sections.title: Ocean Breeze Restaurant
sections.description: Enjoy a beachfront meal at Ocean Breeze Restaurant, where fresh ingredients and local flavors take center stage. With a menu that changes seasonally, each visit is a new experience.

sections.title: Skyline Rooftop Bar
sections.description: The Skyline Rooftop Bar offers breathtaking panoramic views of Lisbon and the Atlantic. Relax with a cocktail and some light bites while watching the sun set over the horizon.

sections.title: Coastal Grill
sections.description: For a more casual atmosphere, visit the Coastal Grill, where you can enjoy freshly grilled seafood and meat dishes. With ocean views and laid-back seating, it’s the perfect spot for a leisurely, enjoyable meal.

sections.title: Private Terrace Dining
sections.description: For an extra special experience, Coastal Haven offers private dining on the terrace. Enjoy a personalized menu crafted by our chefs, perfect for romantic evenings or celebrations.

poolAndBeach.introParagraph: At Coastal Haven, immerse yourself in the tranquility of our stunning pool area and beautiful nearby beach. Enjoy refreshing dips in the pool or unwind on our private beach with breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean.

features.title: Infinity Pool
features.description: Take a refreshing swim in our infinity pool, offering stunning views of the coastline. With comfortable sun loungers and umbrellas available, it’s the perfect spot to relax and soak up the sun.

features.title: Private Beach Access
features.description: Enjoy exclusive access to our pristine private beach, where you can bask in the sun, swim in the clear waters, or participate in beach volleyball and other fun activities.

features.title: Poolside Bar
features.description: Sip on refreshing cocktails and light snacks from our poolside bar. Enjoy the convenience of service while you relax by the pool, ensuring that you never have to stray far from your sunbed.

features.title: Beachfront Lounge Area
features.description: Our beachfront lounge area provides a serene setting for relaxation, complete with comfortable seating and stunning ocean views. It's the perfect spot for unwinding with a book or enjoying a romantic sunset.

activities.title: Activities
activities.description: At Coastal Haven, experience a blend of relaxation and adventure. Indulge in rejuvenating spa treatments while soaking up the beautiful coastal ambiance. For those seeking excitement, explore Lisbon’s vibrant culture with nearby attractions, or engage in outdoor sports just steps from the hotel.

categories.name: Spa Retreat
categories.description: Unwind at our spa retreat, where a variety of soothing treatments await you. From revitalizing massages to indulgent body scrubs, immerse yourself in tranquility. Enjoy a serene atmosphere that invites relaxation, allowing you to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

categories.name: Fitness Center
categories.description: Stay active during your stay at our fully-equipped fitness center, featuring the latest workout machines and free weights. With stunning views of the coastline, every workout becomes a refreshing experience. Join us for personalized training sessions that cater to your fitness goals.

categories.name: Outdoor Activities
categories.description: Embrace the great outdoors with our range of activities, including cycling and beach volleyball. Explore the beautiful Lisbon coastline or take a guided hike to discover hidden gems in the area. Adventure awaits just outside your doorstep!

categories.name: Yoga by the Sea
categories.description: Enhance your well-being with yoga sessions held on the beach, where the sound of waves complements your practice. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced yogi, our skilled instructors will guide you through sessions designed to refresh your body and mind while enjoying stunning ocean views.

hotels.name: Tropical Retreat
hotels.description: A tropical sanctuary nestled in the heart of Bali's lush landscape.
descriptionParagraphs: Welcome to Tropical Retreat, where the jungle meets luxury, and you quickly realize that your shoes can stay in the suitcase for your entire vacation. Each private villa boasts its own plunge pool, perfect for cooling off while palm fronds sway overhead and birds serenade you with a soundtrack that would make Spotify jealous.

If you tire of lounging in your plunge pool (unlikely, but let’s pretend), our magical jungle spa awaits. Here, you can indulge in a relaxing treatment that will have you feeling brand new—all while surrounded by the serene embrace of nature. And just minutes away, you’ll find the beach, where the waves whisper, 'Come and chill out.'

At Tropical Retreat, every day is an adventure in indulgence. Enjoy yoga with a jungle view, learn to cook Balinese cuisine in our cooking classes, or trek through lush landscapes to discover your inner zen. It’s impossible not to unwind here—stress? What’s that?

So whether you’re here to soak up Bali’s beach life or to hide away in a jungle villa and find your inner chill, Tropical Retreat has your back (and your sun lounger!). With free Wi-Fi, delicious food and drinks, and an unbeatable sense of tranquility, you might never want to leave. And who could blame you?
hotels.roomDescription: At Tropical Retreat, we offer a curated selection of rooms and villas that capture the essence of Bali’s serene beauty while providing modern comfort for families and couples alike. Our rooms are designed to complement the lush surroundings, making your stay a harmonious blend of relaxation and luxury.

rooms.description: Wake up to the sights and sounds of Bali’s tropical gardens in our 38-square-meter Garden View Double Room. This room offers a queen-size bed, a private balcony, and complimentary WiFi, making it a perfect escape for nature lovers looking to unwind. Enjoy serene mornings with breakfast on your balcony, surrounded by the calming greenery.

Step into luxury with our 55-square-meter Poolside Villa, featuring direct access to a private plunge pool. This villa offers a king-size bed, an outdoor shower, and a secluded patio for a refreshing blend of indoor and outdoor living. It’s an ideal choice for couples seeking an intimate and peaceful getaway in tropical paradise.

Perfect for families, our 60-square-meter Family Garden Suite includes two interconnected bedrooms with king-size beds, a spacious living area, and a private balcony with garden views. Enjoy modern amenities and a kid-friendly atmosphere in this relaxing and functional suite.

Immerse yourself in the beauty of Bali's coastline in our 45-square-meter Ocean Breeze Bungalow. Offering stunning ocean views, a king-size bed, and a private terrace, this bungalow combines luxury and nature for a truly tranquil experience. Enjoy your morning coffee with the sound of waves in the background.

aboutTheRooms.headingText: At Tropical Retreat, each room and villa is a sanctuary designed to complement Bali’s natural beauty. Whether you're enjoying the garden views or soaking up the ocean breeze, every detail is crafted for your comfort and relaxation.

cards.title: Garden View Double Room
cards.text: Relax in our cozy 38-square-meter Garden View Double Room, where you can unwind on a private balcony while surrounded by lush tropical gardens. Ideal for couples or solo travelers seeking tranquility.

cards.title: Poolside Villa
cards.text: Our 55-square-meter Poolside Villa offers an intimate plunge pool and a secluded patio. Experience the perfect mix of luxury and privacy, with modern amenities that ensure a comfortable stay.

cards.title: Family Garden Suite
cards.text: Designed for families, this 60-square-meter suite features two king-size beds, a spacious living area, and a private balcony with garden views. Enjoy family time in a serene and spacious setting.

cards.title: Ocean Breeze Bungalow
cards.text: Take in the ocean views from your private terrace in our 45-square-meter Ocean Breeze Bungalow. With modern amenities and direct beach access, it's perfect for a romantic getaway or a peaceful retreat.

aboutTheRestaurant.headingText: Enjoy a culinary journey at Tropical Retreat, where local Balinese flavors meet international dishes. Our restaurants provide the perfect setting to savor exquisite meals surrounded by lush greenery and exotic views.
aboutTheRestaurant.introParagraph: At Tropical Retreat, you can choose from several unique dining experiences. Whether you're looking for a romantic dinner on the beach, a relaxed lunch by the pool, or an exclusive dinner amidst the jungle, we have something to suit your tastes.

sections.title: Jungle Bistro
sections.description: Our Jungle Bistro offers a relaxing and nature-inspired dining experience where you can enjoy authentic Balinese dishes made with fresh, local ingredients. Overlooking the lush jungle, it’s the perfect spot for a tranquil lunch or dinner.

sections.title: Beachside Grill
sections.description: Unwind at the Beachside Grill, where you can savor grilled seafood and meats while feeling the sand between your toes and listening to the waves. It’s perfect for a relaxing dinner by the beach.

sections.title: The Canopy Bar
sections.description: The Canopy Bar is an ideal place to enjoy a cocktail after a long day of adventure. Located high among the trees, this bar offers spectacular views of the resort and the sea on the horizon.

sections.title: Private In-Villa Dining
sections.description: For a more intimate experience, Tropical Retreat offers private in-villa dining. Enjoy a tailored menu and romantic ambiance, perfect for special occasions.

poolAndBeach.introParagraph: At Tropical Retreat, unwind at our serene pools or bask in the sun on Bali’s pristine beaches. The hotel features stunning lagoon-style pools that invite relaxation, while the nearby beach offers a tropical escape just moments away. Please note: While the beach is beautiful, it is essential to be cautious of the tides and any rocky areas. Here are some nearby beaches you may explore:

beaches.title: Kuta Beach
beaches.description: Famous for its vibrant atmosphere and surfing opportunities, Kuta Beach boasts golden sands and breathtaking sunsets. It’s the perfect spot for both relaxation and adventure, with plenty of beachfront bars and restaurants nearby.

beaches.title: Seminyak Beach
beaches.description: A chic and upscale beach, Seminyak offers a stylish vibe with luxurious beach clubs and trendy restaurants. Enjoy sunbathing on soft sands or indulging in a relaxing spa treatment right by the sea.

beaches.title: Jimbaran Beach
beaches.description: Known for its calm waters and stunning sunset dinners, Jimbaran Beach is ideal for families and couples alike. The beach features soft sands and is famous for its seafood restaurants lining the shore.

beaches.title: Nusa Dua Beach
beaches.description: For those seeking tranquility, Nusa Dua Beach provides a serene environment with pristine white sands and crystal-clear waters. This beach is perfect for swimming and sunbathing, along with a variety of water sports available.

activities.title: Activities

For those seeking adventure, explore the surrounding lush landscapes, and enjoy various water sports just a short distance from the resort.

categories.name: Spa
categories.description: Discover tranquility at our tropical spa, where Balinese-inspired treatments harmonize your mind, body, and spirit. Enjoy signature massages, revitalizing facials, and soothing body wraps, all designed to elevate your relaxation experience amidst the sounds of nature.

categories.name: Fitness Center
categories.description: Stay active in our well-equipped fitness center featuring the latest equipment and free weights. Enjoy workouts with panoramic views of the gardens, making every session enjoyable. Join our outdoor classes for a refreshing change of scenery.

categories.name: Cultural Workshops
categories.description: Engage in our enriching cultural workshops, including traditional Balinese dance, cooking classes, and art sessions. Experience the local culture firsthand and take home unique skills and memories from your stay.

categories.name: Beach Yoga
categories.description: Awaken your senses with beach yoga sessions, where the gentle sound of the waves and the tropical breeze enhance your practice. Perfect for all levels, these sessions provide a peaceful escape while you connect with nature and rejuvenate your spirit.

hotels.name: Ocean Breeze Resort
hotels.description: A beachfront resort offering all-inclusive amenities in the vibrant city of Cancun.
descriptionParagraphs: Welcome to Ocean Breeze Resort, where the only thing more refreshing than the ocean breeze is our all-inclusive packages! Located on the stunning shores of Cancun, this resort is your gateway to a sun-soaked paradise, complete with a private beach that’s just a few steps away from your room.

Kick off your shoes (we promise you won’t need them!) and immerse yourself in a world of relaxation and fun. Enjoy a day filled with thrilling water sports—think jet skiing and scuba diving—or simply lounge by the pool with a cocktail in hand, soaking up the sun and sipping on something fruity. Our friendly staff is always on hand to keep your drink topped up while you soak up the rays.

When the sun sets, our vibrant dining options come to life. Indulge in mouthwatering cuisine at our restaurant, where every meal feels like a celebration. And if you’re in the mood for a little evening fun, gather the family for a lively game of beach volleyball under the stars—who says you can’t mix fitness with fun?

Ocean Breeze Resort is more than just a place to stay; it's a family-friendly adventure hub where every day brings new experiences and lasting memories. With a rating of 4.6, our guests rave about the activities, the stunning views, and, of course, the unforgettable moments that make their vacations special. So pack your bags, bring your sense of adventure, and let the ocean breeze carry you to your next unforgettable getaway!
hotels.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 72 hours before check-in
hotels.roomDescription: At Ocean Breeze Resort, we offer a range of stylish and family-friendly rooms to ensure every guest enjoys their perfect getaway. Whether you're looking for a cozy space for two or a fun-filled family suite, each room is designed to blend comfort with the vibrant spirit of Cancun.

rooms.description: Soak in the tropical ambiance of Cancun in our 38-square-meter Ocean Breeze Double Room. This space offers a comfortable queen-size bed, ocean-inspired decor, and a private balcony where you can enjoy the cool sea breeze. Perfect for couples looking for a tranquil escape with complimentary breakfast and WiFi included.

Perfect for families, this 55-square-meter suite offers plenty of space with a queen-size bed for the adults and bunk beds for the kids. The suite is just steps away from the beach, and your private terrace opens directly onto the resort's lush gardens. Enjoy kid-friendly amenities, free breakfast, and WiFi for the whole family.

aboutTheRestaurant.headingText: På Ocean Breeze Resort erbjuder vi en kulinarisk upplevelse som matchar den fantastiska utsikten över Karibiska havet. Våra restauranger och barer är designade för att ge dig en smak av Cancuns vibranta matkultur, med allt från internationella rätter till lokala specialiteter.
aboutTheRestaurant.introParagraph: Njut av måltider på stranden, avslappnade luncher vid poolen eller en romantisk middag under stjärnorna. Våra restauranger erbjuder något för alla smaklökar, med rätter som tillagas av de finaste och färskaste ingredienserna.

sections.title: Seaside Grill
sections.description: Njut av nygrillad skaldjur och färska köttbitar på vår Seaside Grill. Med utsikt över det turkosa havet och en avslappnad atmosfär, är detta den perfekta platsen för en avkopplande lunch eller middag.

sections.title: El Mar Cantina
sections.description: För en autentisk mexikansk matupplevelse, besök El Mar Cantina. Här kan du njuta av färska tacos, enchiladas och mer, tillsammans med våra specialtillverkade margaritas. Perfekt för en festlig kväll med familj och vänner.

sections.title: The Beach Club
sections.description: Koppla av på The Beach Club, där du kan beställa snacks och cocktails direkt till din solstol. Med utsikt över stranden och live DJ-sets på kvällen, är detta den idealiska platsen för att njuta av dagen.

sections.title: Privat Middag på Stranden
sections.description: För en mer intim upplevelse, erbjuder vi privat middag på stranden. Avnjut en måltid under stjärnorna med en skräddarsydd meny och en atmosfär som gör varje tillfälle speciellt.

poolAndBeach.introParagraph: At Ocean Breeze Resort, immerse yourself in relaxation by the pool or enjoy the stunning beachfront of Cancun. Our resort boasts pristine pools perfect for lounging, while the golden sands of Cancun Beach are just steps away, offering a true paradise experience.

beaches.title: Cancun Beach
beaches.description: Famous for its powdery white sands and turquoise waters, Cancun Beach is ideal for sunbathing and swimming. Enjoy the warm sun and gentle waves, perfect for a relaxing day by the sea.

beaches.title: Playa Delfines
beaches.description: A family-friendly beach known for its calm waters and beautiful scenery, Playa Delfines is perfect for swimming and picnicking. Facilities include restrooms and beach umbrellas, making it a great spot for all ages.

beaches.title: Playa Tortugas
beaches.description: A lively beach offering a mix of relaxation and entertainment, Playa Tortugas is known for its water sports and vibrant atmosphere. Enjoy activities like snorkeling, jet skiing, and beach volleyball, along with nearby bars and restaurants.

beaches.title: Playa Chac Mool
beaches.description: This beach is a hidden gem, providing a quieter atmosphere for guests seeking tranquility. With beautiful views and fewer crowds, Playa Chac Mool is perfect for sunbathing and enjoying a peaceful day by the water.

activities.title: Activities
activities.description: At Ocean Breeze Resort, immerse yourself in a world of relaxation and adventure. Unwind in our luxurious spa, take a dip in the hot tub, or rejuvenate in our sauna. For those looking to keep active, enjoy access to our beachside fitness center and a variety of water sports available right at your doorstep.

categories.name: Spa & Wellness
categories.description: Escape to tranquility at our full-service spa, where expert therapists offer an array of indulgent treatments designed to relax and rejuvenate. Experience soothing massages, revitalizing facials, and holistic therapies in a serene ocean-view setting that melts away stress.

categories.name: Beach Fitness
categories.description: Stay fit while enjoying the sun with our beach fitness classes! Join us for invigorating workouts right on the sand, including beach volleyball, aqua aerobics, and yoga. The gentle sound of waves will motivate you to push your limits while you soak up the sun.

categories.name: Water Sports
categories.description: Dive into adventure with our selection of exciting water sports! From snorkeling in crystal-clear waters to paddleboarding along the coastline, there's an activity for everyone. Equipment is available for rent, making it easy to explore the vibrant marine life just off the shore.

categories.name: Yoga on the Beach
categories.description: Enhance your wellness journey with our yoga sessions held right on the beach. Feel the soft sand beneath you as you stretch and breathe in the fresh ocean air. Our experienced instructors guide you through sessions designed to relax your mind and energize your spirit.

hotels.name: Grand Alpine Hotel
hotels.description: A majestic alpine retreat with direct access to the slopes and stunning mountain views.
descriptionParagraphs: Welcome to the Grand Alpine Hotel, where snow-capped peaks and luxury collide in a delightful dance of comfort and adventure! Nestled in the heart of Innsbruck, this stunning retreat is your ticket to an alpine paradise, boasting ski-in/ski-out access that makes hitting the slopes as easy as rolling out of bed.

Imagine waking up in your cozy mountain-view room, the gentle morning light spilling in as you sip your coffee while gazing at the breathtaking landscape outside. Once you've fueled up, it's time to channel your inner snow bunny! With powdery slopes beckoning, you’ll be gliding down the mountains in no time. And if the skiing gets too intense, fear not—our heated rooftop pool is ready to warm your bones and elevate your spirits after a day of thrilling descents.

After a day on the mountain, indulge in some well-deserved pampering at our spa, where relaxation is just a massage away. Or gather with friends and family in our on-site restaurant, where hearty alpine cuisine awaits. We promise, our chef knows how to whip up a dish that’ll make you want to yodel with delight!

At the Grand Alpine Hotel, every moment is an opportunity for fun, whether it’s shredding powder, unwinding in the spa, or simply soaking in the alpine ambiance. With a top-notch rating of 4.9, guests rave about the unforgettable memories made here—after all, what’s better than a winter wonderland with all the amenities you could dream of? So grab your winter gear and prepare for an unforgettable escape where the mountains meet luxury!
hotels.roomDescription: At Grand Alpine Hotel, we offer a range of beautifully crafted rooms that blend alpine charm with modern comfort. Whether you're here for a family vacation or a romantic escape, our rooms are designed to make your stay unforgettable, with breathtaking views of the Austrian Alps.

rooms.description: Embrace the rustic charm of the Alps in our Cozy Alpine Double Room. This 32-square-meter retreat offers a queen-size bed, wooden accents, and a private balcony with stunning views of the surrounding mountains. Perfect for couples seeking a peaceful hideaway, the room includes complimentary breakfast, WiFi, and a calming atmosphere to relax after a day of alpine adventures.
amenities: Flat-screen TV with alpine scenery channels

rooms.description: Step into luxury with our 45-square-meter Mountain View Suite, designed for both relaxation and awe. Featuring a king-size bed and a separate living area, this suite provides panoramic views of the Alps from your private balcony. The suite also includes complimentary breakfast, free WiFi, and exclusive access to our rooftop heated pool for a perfect alpine escape.
amenities: Private balcony with uninterrupted mountain views
Flat-screen TV with international and local channels

rooms.description: Designed with families in mind, our 50-square-meter Alpine Family Room offers a spacious setup with a queen-size bed and two single beds. Enjoy the comforts of home while experiencing the alpine environment. This room includes a family bathroom, complimentary breakfast, and WiFi, making it ideal for those traveling with children.
amenities: Queen-size bed and two single beds

rooms.description: Perfect for travelers seeking extra space, our Junior Suite offers 55 square meters of alpine-inspired luxury. With a king-size bed, a cozy seating area, and a private terrace overlooking the snowy peaks, this suite is an idyllic escape. Enjoy complimentary breakfast, free WiFi, and access to all hotel facilities during your stay.

aboutTheRooms.headingText: At Grand Alpine Hotel, our rooms provide a perfect blend of alpine charm and modern luxury. With breathtaking mountain views and cozy interiors, each room is designed to offer a serene and comfortable retreat for families, couples, and adventurers alike.

cards.title: Alpine Double Room
cards.text: A 32-square-meter room with rustic wooden decor, a queen-size bed, and a private balcony that offers stunning views of the Austrian Alps. Ideal for couples or solo travelers looking for a cozy, alpine experience.

cards.title: Mountain View Suite
cards.text: Our 45-square-meter suite with a king-size bed, spacious living area, and a private balcony. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Alps and exclusive amenities including a rooftop heated pool.

cards.title: Alpine Family Room
cards.text: A spacious 50-square-meter room with a queen-size bed, two single beds, and a family-friendly setup. Perfect for families seeking a comfortable and convenient stay in the heart of the Alps.

cards.title: Junior Suite with Mountain Views
cards.text: A 55-square-meter suite with a king-size bed, separate seating area, and a private terrace. Enjoy panoramic views of the Alps and access to all of our hotel’s luxurious amenities.

infoBoxItems: Flat-screen TV with local and international channels
Minibar with complimentary soft drinks and snacks
Private balcony or terrace with mountain views

aboutTheRestaurant.headingText: At Grand Alpine Hotel, you can enjoy delicious alpine cuisine with flavors inspired by Austrian tradition, all while taking in the majestic views of the Alps. Our restaurants offer everything from rustic dishes to fine dining, crafted with local ingredients for an authentic taste experience.
aboutTheRestaurant.introParagraph: After a day on the slopes or in the spa, our restaurant invites you to experience warm hospitality and a wide range of culinary delights. We offer everything from relaxed meals to elegant dining options, perfect for every palate.

sections.title: The Alpine Grill
sections.description: The Alpine Grill serves flavorful grilled dishes with an alpine twist. Here, you’ll find both meat and fish options, accompanied by fresh vegetables and handmade sauces. Perfect for a laid-back lunch after a day on the slopes.

sections.title: The Mountain Bistro
sections.description: Our bistro offers a cozy atmosphere and traditional Austrian dishes. Enjoy goulash soup, wiener schnitzel, and other classics, all served with a smile and the warmth of our open fireplace.

sections.title: Skyline Rooftop Bar
sections.description: On the rooftop, you’ll find the Skyline Rooftop Bar, where you can relax with a cocktail and enjoy the stunning views of the Alps. It’s the perfect way to end the day and toast with friends.

sections.title: Private Dining
sections.description: For an exclusive experience, we offer private dining with alpine views. Enjoy a meal tailored to your preferences, featuring the best of both Austrian and international cuisine.

poolAndBeach.introParagraph: At the Grand Alpine Hotel, you can unwind by our stunning pool while soaking in the breathtaking views of the Tyrolean Alps. If you’re looking for adventure, the nearby mountain trails and ski slopes offer a perfect escape into nature.

beaches.title: Lake Baggersee
beaches.description: A beautiful lake located just outside Innsbruck, Baggersee is perfect for swimming and picnicking. With sunbathing areas and lush green surroundings, it offers a refreshing escape during the summer months.

beaches.title: Patscherkofel Mountain
beaches.description: Famous for its skiing in winter, Patscherkofel also offers stunning hiking trails in summer. Enjoy breathtaking views of Innsbruck from the top and explore the natural beauty of the Alps.

beaches.title: Natterer See
beaches.description: This idyllic lake is a hidden gem perfect for families. Natterer See features swimming areas, playgrounds, and a café, making it a great spot for a fun day out by the water.

beaches.title: Muttereralm
beaches.description: For those looking for a unique alpine experience, Muttereralm offers both summer and winter activities. Enjoy hiking trails with scenic views in summer or skiing in winter, with a cozy mountain restaurant to relax in afterward.

poolList: Outdoor Infinity Pool: 300 m² with mountain views
Indoor Relaxation Pool: 150 m² with wellness area
